name: Necromorph
description:
NECROMORPH by Supernaught

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys – Move

Z – Jump

X – Attack

R – Restart level

Tip: Up Arrow + Attack when using bow to attack upwards

Supernaught is

Alphonsus (@alphnsus) – Code

Dave (@momorgoth) – Art
